languages.text: Первым шагом в борьбе с мятежниками стало вытеснение их подполья из столицы и крупных городов. Благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Императором Лорд-капитан рассмотрел{mf||а} несколько методик борьбы, после чего избрал{mf||а} наилучшую.

traits.locale_text: Первым шагом в борьбе с мятежниками стало вытеснение их подполья из столицы и крупных городов. Благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Императором Лорд-капитан рассмотрел{mf||а} несколько методик борьбы, после чего избрал{mf||а} наилучшую.

languages.text: The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.
languages.original_text: Первым шагом в борьбе с мятежниками стало вытеснение их подполья из столицы и крупных городов. Благословенн{mf|ый|ая} Императором Лорд-капитан рассмотрел{mf||а} несколько методик борьбы, после чего избрал{mf||а} наилучшую.

traits.locale_text: The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

languages.text: 暴徒との闘争の第一段階は、首都および主要都市の建屋から暴徒を一掃することにあった。皇帝の祝福受けしロード・キャプテンは、最適なオプションを選択する前に複数の鎮圧戦略を立てた。
languages.original_text: The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

traits.locale_text: 暴徒との闘争の第一段階は、首都および主要都市の建屋から暴徒を一掃することにあった。皇帝の祝福受けしロード・キャプテンは、最適なオプションを選択する前に複数の鎮圧戦略を立てた。

languages.text: 打击叛乱分子的第一步，是将他们的基层组织从首都与主要城市赶走。帝皇保佑的舰长大人考虑了好几种镇压策略，随后选择了最佳方案。
languages.original_text: The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

traits.locale_text: 打击叛乱分子的第一步，是将他们的基层组织从首都与主要城市赶走。帝皇保佑的舰长大人考虑了好几种镇压策略，随后选择了最佳方案。

languages.text: El primer paso en la lucha contra los insurgentes consistía en expulsar sus células de las capitales y grandes ciudades. {mf|El Lord Capitán|La Lord Capitán}, que el Emperador {mf|lo|la} bendiga, se planteó diversas estrategias de supresión antes de escoger la mejor opción.
languages.original_text: The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

traits.locale_text: El primer paso en la lucha contra los insurgentes consistía en expulsar sus células de las capitales y grandes ciudades. {mf|El Lord Capitán|La Lord Capitán}, que el Emperador {mf|lo|la} bendiga, se planteó diversas estrategias de supresión antes de escoger la mejor opción.

languages.text: Der erste Schritt im Kampf gegen die Aufständischen bestand darin, ihre Zellen aus der Hauptstadt und den übrigen Großstädten zu vertreiben. Der vom Imperator gesegnete Lord Captain erwog mehrere Strategien und wählte dann die beste Option.
languages.original_text: The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

traits.locale_text: Der erste Schritt im Kampf gegen die Aufständischen bestand darin, ihre Zellen aus der Hauptstadt und den übrigen Großstädten zu vertreiben. Der vom Imperator gesegnete Lord Captain erwog mehrere Strategien und wählte dann die beste Option.

languages.text: La première étape dans la lutte contre les révolutionnaires consista à chasser leurs cellules de la capitale et des grandes villes. Avec la bénédiction de l'Empereur, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} envisagea différentes stratégies d'étouffement, avant de choisir la meilleure option.
languages.original_text: The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

traits.locale_text: La première étape dans la lutte contre les révolutionnaires consista à chasser leurs cellules de la capitale et des grandes villes. Avec la bénédiction de l'Empereur, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} envisagea différentes stratégies d'étouffement, avant de choisir la meilleure option.

languages.text: Asilere karşı mücadelede atılan ilk adım, hücrelerini başkentten ve büyük şehirlerden defetmek oldu. İmparator'un kutsadığı Lord Kaptan, birkaç farklı bastırma stratejisini göz önünde bulundurup en makbul seçenekte karar kıldı.
languages.original_text: The first step in the struggle against the insurrectionists was to drive their cells out of the capital and major cities. The Emperor-Blessed Lord Captain considered several suppression strategies before choosing the best option.

traits.locale_text: Asilere karşı mücadelede atılan ilk adım, hücrelerini başkentten ve büyük şehirlerden defetmek oldu. İmparator'un kutsadığı Lord Kaptan, birkaç farklı bastırma stratejisini göz önünde bulundurup en makbul seçenekte karar kıldı.
